name: Classic Chocolate Cake
description: A medium-sized double-layer chocolate cake with rich chocolate frosting, perfect for birthdays and celebrations. This affordable cake is a crowd-pleaser with its moist texture and deep cocoa flavor.

name: Vanilla Bean Delight
description: A medium-sized vanilla cake with flecks of real vanilla bean throughout, topped with creamy vanilla buttercream. This reasonably priced cake offers a classic, elegant option for any occasion.

name: Red Velvet Elegance
description: A large red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting, suitable for anniversaries and romantic celebrations. This premium cake combines a subtle cocoa flavor with a stunning red color.

name: Luscious Lemon Layer Cake
description: A medium-sized lemon cake with lemon curd filling and zesty lemon buttercream, great for spring events and bridal showers. This reasonably priced cake offers a perfect balance of sweet and tangy flavors.

name: Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese
description: A large spiced carrot cake with walnuts, raisins, and creamy cream cheese frosting, perfect for family gatherings. This moderately priced cake is packed with flavor and nostalgic charm.

name: Tiramisu Torte
description: A medium-sized Italian tiramisu cake with espresso-soaked layers, mascarpone filling, and cocoa dusting, suitable for dinner parties. This high-end cake brings sophisticated coffee flavors to any celebration.

name: Confetti Birthday Cake
description: A large, colorful vanilla cake with rainbow sprinkles throughout and vanilla buttercream, ideal for children's birthdays. This mid-range cake brings joy and celebration with every colorful slice.

name: Simple Strawberry Shortcake
description: A medium-sized light vanilla sponge cake layered with fresh strawberries and whipped cream, perfect for summer gatherings. This budget-friendly cake is a light and refreshing classic.

name: Ultimate Chocolate Truffle Cake
description: A large decadent chocolate cake with chocolate ganache, chocolate shavings, and edible gold dust, suitable for luxury events and milestone celebrations. This premium cake is the ultimate chocolate lover's dream.

name: Seasonal Fruit Cake
description: A medium-sized vanilla cake topped with seasonal fresh fruits and a light glaze, perfect for any general occasion. This reasonably priced cake showcases the best fruits of the season.

name: Classic Cupcake Box - Vanilla
description: A box of 12 vanilla cupcakes with vanilla buttercream and sprinkles, suitable for parties and office celebrations. These affordable cupcakes are a convenient crowd-pleaser.

name: Classic Cupcake Box - Chocolate
description: A box of 12 chocolate cupcakes with chocolate frosting, perfect for parties and small gatherings. These reasonably priced cupcakes satisfy any chocolate craving.

name: Assorted Cupcake Collection
description: A box of 12 cupcakes with an assortment of flavors including vanilla, chocolate, red velvet, and lemon, ideal for offering variety at events. This mid-range collection pleases diverse palates.

name: Rustic Apple Cinnamon Cake
description: A large spiced apple cake with cinnamon streusel topping and caramel drizzle, suitable for fall gatherings and Thanksgiving. This premium cake brings a touch of autumn comfort to any table.

name: Tropical Coconut Pineapple Cake
description: A large, exotic cake with coconut layers, pineapple filling, and coconut cream frosting, perfect for summer parties and tropical-themed events. This high-end cake is a vacation for your taste buds.

name: Mini Cheesecake Sampler
description: A set of 12 bite-sized cheesecakes in various flavors including classic, strawberry, chocolate, and caramel, ideal for dessert platters. This moderately priced sampler offers elegant variety.

name: Gluten-Free Chocolate Cake
description: A small, rich chocolate cake made with gluten-free flour and topped with ganache, perfect for those with gluten sensitivities. This reasonably priced specialty cake ensures everyone can enjoy dessert.

name: Vegan Vanilla Celebration Cake
description: A medium-sized vanilla cake made without animal products, topped with vegan buttercream, suitable for those following a vegan lifestyle. This premium specialty cake is as delicious as it is inclusive.

name: Pumpkin Spice Cake
description: A medium-sized spiced pumpkin cake with cream cheese frosting, perfect for fall birthdays and Thanksgiving. This reasonably priced seasonal cake captures the essence of autumn.

name: Winter Peppermint Chocolate Cake
description: A large chocolate cake with peppermint buttercream and crushed candy cane decoration, ideal for Christmas and winter celebrations. This premium seasonal cake brings festive flavors to holiday gatherings.

name: Spring Lemon Blueberry Cake
description: A medium-sized lemon cake with blueberry compote filling and lemon cream cheese frosting, suitable for Easter and spring events. This affordable cake is a fresh burst of springtime flavor.

name: Summer Berry Chantilly Cake
description: A large vanilla cake layered with fresh summer berries and light Chantilly cream, perfect for garden parties and summer weddings. This moderately priced cake captures the essence of summer freshness.

name: Mini Bundt Cake Box
description: A set of 6 mini bundt cakes in assorted flavors including lemon, chocolate, and cinnamon, ideal for gifts or small gatherings. This affordable collection offers charming individual-sized treats.

name: Lavender Honey Cake
description: A medium-sized delicate cake infused with lavender and honey, topped with honey buttercream, perfect for tea parties and Mother's Day. This reasonably priced specialty cake offers a unique floral experience.

name: Citrus Explosion Cake
description: A medium-sized cake featuring layers of lemon, orange, and lime flavors with citrus buttercream, ideal for summer birthdays. This moderately priced cake adds a zesty brightness to any celebration.

name: Dark Chocolate Espresso Cake
description: A large, intense chocolate cake infused with espresso, covered in mocha ganache, perfect for sophisticated adult celebrations. This premium cake offers a bold and complex flavor profile.

name: Cherry Blossom Almond Cake
description: A medium-sized almond cake with cherry filling and delicate pink cherry blossom decoration, ideal for bridal showers or spring celebrations. This moderately priced cake brings an elegant and romantic touch.

name: Ocean Blue Ombre Cake
description: A medium-sized vanilla cake with blue ombre frosting reminiscent of ocean waves, perfect for beach-themed parties or baby showers. This reasonably priced cake offers a stunning visual presentation.

name: Rustic Naked Cake
description: A medium-sized minimally frosted cake with visible layers and fresh berries, ideal for rustic weddings and farm-to-table events. This affordable cake brings a touch of understated elegance to any occasion.

name: Elegant Black and White Cake
description: A large, sophisticated cake featuring alternating layers of white and dark chocolate with matching two-tone frosting, perfect for formal events and milestone birthdays. This premium cake offers a timeless and luxurious aesthetic.

name: Sunshine Lemon Cupcakes
description: A box of 12 cheerful lemon cupcakes with lemon buttercream and yellow sugar crystals, great for spring events or brightening someone's day. These budget-friendly cupcakes are sure to bring smiles.

name: Royal Purple Velvet Cake
description: A large cake featuring rich purple velvet layers with cream cheese frosting and silver accents, suitable for luxurious celebrations and milestone birthdays. This premium cake exudes elegance and sophistication.

name: Fairy Tale Castle Cake
description: A small but elaborate castle-shaped cake with turrets and edible glitter, perfect for children's fantasy-themed birthdays. This high-end specialty cake creates magical memories for special celebrations.

name: Holiday Yule Log Cake
description: A medium-sized chocolate roll cake decorated to resemble a traditional Yule log with meringue mushrooms, ideal for Christmas celebrations. This moderately priced seasonal cake brings festive tradition to holiday gatherings.

name: Rainbow Layer Cake
description: A large, show-stopping cake with six rainbow-colored layers and vanilla buttercream, perfect for Pride celebrations and colorful themed parties. This premium cake creates gasps of delight when cut open.

name: Pastel Watercolor Cake
description: A medium-sized vanilla cake with buttercream frosted in soft watercolor-style pastels, ideal for baby showers and spring celebrations. This reasonably priced cake offers a gentle and artistic presentation.

name: Cookies and Cream Cake
description: A medium-sized chocolate cake with cookies and cream filling and frosting, topped with chocolate sandwich cookies, perfect for casual celebrations. This affordable cake combines two classic dessert favorites.

name: Silver Anniversary Cake
description: A medium-sized elegant white cake with silver leaf accents and white chocolate ganache, ideal for 25th wedding anniversaries. This premium cake offers a sophisticated and commemorative centerpiece.

name: Tropical Mango Passion Fruit Cake
description: A large, vibrant cake featuring mango and passion fruit layers with coconut cream frosting, perfect for summer parties and tropical-themed events. This high-end cake brings exotic flavors to any celebration.

name: Victorian Sponge Cake
description: A large, classic sponge cake filled with strawberry jam and vanilla buttercream, dusted with powdered sugar, ideal for afternoon teas and garden parties. This moderately priced cake offers timeless British elegance.

name: Salted Caramel Drip Cake
description: A medium-sized chocolate cake with salted caramel filling, caramel buttercream, and a dramatic caramel drip, perfect for trendy celebrations. This reasonably priced cake offers an indulgent sweet-salty experience.

name: Fresh Strawberry Shortcake Cupcakes
description: A box of 12 vanilla cupcakes topped with whipped cream and fresh strawberries, ideal for summer gatherings. These reasonably priced cupcakes offer a light and refreshing individual dessert option.

name: Maple Pecan Cake
description: A medium-sized spice cake with maple syrup, chopped pecans, and maple buttercream frosting, perfect for fall gatherings and Thanksgiving. This moderately priced cake brings warm autumnal flavors to any table.
